name: Tank (itch) (JammingJennie)
description:
My fourth game I created called Tank. Based on Vietnam War. Enjoy!

Player 1 Controls

W = Go, A = Rotate Left, D = Rotate Right, S = Backwards, F = Shoot

Player 2 Controls

Up Arrow = Go, Left Arrow = Rotate Left, Right Arrow = Rotate Right, Down Arrow = Backwards, / = Shoot
